title: Walmart Suspends Violent Ads - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.09.19
description:
Get your trial month of Hims for just $5 today http://forhims.com/GAMESDAILY.

Go to http://buyraycon.com/KFGAMES to get 15% off your order!

Tim and Greg talk about Walmart suspending in-store advertisements for violent media like games, movies, and hunting. 

Time Stamps - 
00:03:43 - Housekeeping
We’re going to the Canadian National Exhibition in Toronto next week! August 16-18, Greg, Tim, and Andy will be hosting two panels a day in the Gaming Garage! kindafunny.com/events
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack and Mohammed Mohammed
The Roper Report   -
00:04:56 - Wal-Mart Pulls Violent Video Game Ads
00:12:30 - “Is this the first very small step towards that sort of legislation by the US government?” - Black Jack
00:20:17 - ESPN, ABC Pull 'Apex Legends' Esports Tournament Following Mass Shootings
00:31:14 - Video Games are popular in the UK
00:32:08 - Epic Games, THQ on Loot Box Transparency
00:34:15 - Gears 5 Has Gone Gold
00:35:18 - Twitch Studio Beta
00:39:00 - Total War Headed to Troy?
00:40:08 - Out today
00:42:41 -  Hims
00:44:00 - Raycon
Reader mail   -
00:45:35 - “Do you ‘miss’ the earlier days?” - 2038 Pokemon CEO
00:52:18 - Squad Up: Constantine - IRL at the CNE/Rainbow 6 Siege - Reddit: CJ_G / Steam: Fapa4u2
00:53:55 - You‘re Wrong
Next Week’s Hosts:
Monday - Greg & Tim
Tuesday - Greg & Andrea
Wednesday - Greg & Whitta
Thursday - Andrea & Barrett?
Friday - Fran & Barrett

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
